Desc.eng: I could sell you any of the other documents for 3000 gold each. And while I was hiding underground, I found a map that’s supposed to show the way to some hidden treasure. That costs 8000.
You bargain like a merchant. I’ll pay 3000 for the blueprints for an Improved Generator by Heinrich von Sturm (Generator Plan)
Treasure hunt! I just love the classics. I’ll buy the map. (Find the hidden treasure quest)
I need some money, but I’ll come back later.
I would like to take a look at these documents.
That's a huge sum of money. Anyway, I’ll buy Fulmigati’s research paper on a mechanical trap. (Trap Plan)
I see some notes by Dr. Blawatzky on human body and mind. What do you want for them? (+5 ability points)
